arabic_text: بَرَآءَةٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ عَٰهَدتُّم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
translation: [This is] a declaration of disassociation[1] by Allah and His Messenger to those polytheists with whom you have made a treaty.
footnotes: [1] This surah, unlike all surahs of the Qur’an, is not preceded by al-basmalah (the usual opening statement).
